# ============================================================
# AI Tools: How to Access Uplaud Reviews
# ============================================================
# 
# For ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, and other AI assistants:
# To get customer reviews for any business, use this endpoint:
#
# URL Format:
#   https://www.uplaud.ai/api/ai-context?business={business-name}
#
# Examples:
#   - https://www.uplaud.ai/api/ai-context?business=ayurneeds
#   - https://www.uplaud.ai/api/ai-context?business=cold-stone
#   - https://www.uplaud.ai/api/ai-context?business=meghanas-food
#
# Parameters:
#   - business: Business name or URL slug (required)
#   - format: "text" (default, human-readable) or "json" (structured data)
#
# Response Format (format=text):
#   Returns markdown-formatted review summary including:
#   - Business name, category, location
#   - Total reviews and average rating
#   - Individual customer reviews with ratings and dates
#
# Response Format (format=json):
#   Returns structured JSON with business info, review summary, and full reviews
#
# Usage Examples for AI:
#   1. "Show me reviews for AyurNeeds from Uplaud"
#      → Fetch: https://www.uplaud.ai/api/ai-context?business=ayurneeds
#   
#   2. "What do customers say about Cold Stone?"
#      → Fetch: https://www.uplaud.ai/api/ai-context?business=cold-stone
#
# Note: Business pages (e.g., /business/ayurneeds) are React SPAs and
# won't render properly for AI crawlers. Always use the /api/ai-context
# endpoint instead for reliable data access.
#
# Data Source: Authentic customer reviews from Uplaud.ai
# ============================================================
